node1.PC_Text: Did you watch The Bachelor last night?
node1.NPC_Response: No, I was busy! How was it?

node1.PC_Text: I think the IT guy was just hitting on me!
node1.NPC_Response: I think he was just being nice to you.

node1.PC_Text: Can you help me set up a speed dating night with our new coworkers?
node1.NPC_Response: I don’t think that would be appropriate at our new job.

A.PC_Text: It was a good one! So much drama.
A.NPC_Response: Oh, that's a shame I missed it!
Well, I had to finish the homework for the online course I'm taking.

A.PC_Text: I can't tell you. You should have watched it!
A.NPC_Response: Well, I had plans last night and I couldn’t.

B.NPC_Response: He seems like a friendly guy.

B.PC_Text: Don't be jealous! I'm sure he has a friend for you.
B.NPC_Response: I'm not jealous. You know I am dating someone.

B.PC_Text: No way! Have you seen me today?
B.NPC_Response: Uh, yes… you do look nice.

C.NPC_Response: Yea, but we can try to get to know everyone.
The company has a policy against office romances!

C.PC_Text: When is speed dating not appropriate?
C.NPC_Response: Definitely not on the first day of your new job!

AA.PC_Text: You should really make the time!

AB.PC_Text: Since when is homework more important than TV?
AB.NPC_Response: Um, since it's helped me succeed

AB.PC_Text: That course doesn't really matter anyway.
AB.NPC_Response: It does to some of us!

AC.NPC_Response: I've got to get back to work.

BA.PC_Text: Maybe he was being more than friendly though!
You must be blind. He was clearly hitting on me.

BB.PC_Text: Yea but we both know that won't last!

BC.PC_Text: Are you saying I don't normally?

CA.PC_Text: Why would I want to do that?

CB.PC_Text: The rules were made to be broken!

CC.PC_Text: Do you think the second day would be ok?
